cocktails.name: New York Sour
cocktails.method: dry shake, shake & fine strain (everything but wine)

cocktails.name: Mamie Taylor
cocktails.extra: top ginger beer & 4 dashes of angostura

cocktails.name: Fog Cutter
cocktails.extra: float of sherry - Moscatel if possible

ingredients.name: funky white rum (eg: Banks 5 Island, Wray & Nephew, agricole rums)

cocktails.name: Scorpion
cocktails.garnish: grated nutmeg, orange & lime wheel, orchid

cocktails.name: Zombie (1934)
cocktails.garnish: flaming half lime, cinnamon stick, whatever other cool stuff on top

cocktails.name: Georgia Julep
cocktails.extra: slap the mint to release the oils

cocktails.name: Bellini
cocktails.extra: to make it extra cold, stir the peach puree with a splash of prosecco over ice & strain inside the flute - then top with more prosecco

ingredients.name: creme de peche or peach puree

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.garnish: olives or gerkins, lemon wedge & celery stick

cocktails.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktails.extra: gently crush cognac, sugar & bitters together - top with champagne

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.ice: cubed if served in rock glass

cocktails.name: Godfather / Godmother
cocktails.extra: scotch for the Godfather - vodka for the Godmother

ingredients.name: hot black tea (english breakfast or assam)

cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
cocktails.extra: serve hot - hand whipped heavy cream float

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.garnish: mint sprig, lime wedge & orange slice
cocktails.extra: MUST: be house-made orgeat or premium brand - bottled almond syrup as the wrong viscosity

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.extra: MUST: offer coupe or rock glass & choice of bourbon or rye whiskey

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.extra: MUST: offer salt rim, coupe or rock glass - ALWAYS: salt rim half glass & add straw if on the rocks

cocktails.name: Cadillac Margarita
cocktails.extra: MUST: offer salt rim, coupe or rock glass - ALWAYS: salt rim half glass & add straw if on the rocks

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.extra: slap the mint to release the oils

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.extra: slap the mint to release the oils

cocktails.name: Moscow-mule (and all mules)
cocktails.extra: REPLACE: base spirit with other spirit for different mules

cocktails.name: Old Maid aka London Maid
cocktails.extra: TIP: this recipe works with any white spirit

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.garnish: half salted rim glass & lime wedge

cocktails.name: Pimm's Cup
cocktails.garnish: TOP: orange slice & mint sprig. INSIDE: orange slice, 6 mint leaves, cucumber slice & a quartered strawberry
cocktails.extra: top with ginger ale OR lemonade

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.extra: TIP: KokoKanu or Aluna are great coconut rums to use in alternativly make your own coconut rum - avoid Malibu, please

cocktails.name: Pineapple Daiquiri
cocktails.garnish: stripe of angostura bitter on top

cocktails.name: Pornstar Martini
cocktails.extra: shot of champagne on the side

cocktails.name: Queen's Park Swizzle
cocktails.extra: create a float of angostura after churning & add fresh crushed ice on top of it

cocktails.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
cocktails.extra: put the collins inside a freezer before starting to make the drink - add soda water at the bottom of the glass before straining the cocktail inside - pop the cocktail in the freezer to solidify the foam - after a couple of minutes slowly top it up with soda water to create an attractive head

cocktails.name: Rome with a view
cocktails.extra: top the cocktail with soda water

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.garnish: sugar the rim of half the glass

cocktails.name: Ti' Punch
cocktails.extra: Lime heels are discs sliced deep from the side of the lime, mostly peel but with a thin layer of juice sacs still attached

cocktails.name: Tom Collins
cocktails.extra: top with club soda or any flavoured soda

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.extra: Vegan foamer or pasteurised egg white
